profile.name: Neil Stanley
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at NetApp | Delivering innovative solutions with a passion for open-source development
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a strong background in computer science. Proficient in multiple programming languages, with a focus on collaboration and continuous learning.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at NetApp
description: Designed and developed scalable software solutions for enterprise clients
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time
Mentored junior engineers and contributed to the growth of the team

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to multiple open-source projects, including bug fixes and feature enhancements
Collaborated with community members to improve project visibility and adoption

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients across various industries
Managed multiple projects simultaneously, meeting tight deadlines and delivering high-quality results

experience.title: Software Engineer at XYZ Corporation
description: Designed and developed software applications for enterprise clients
Collaborated with the QA team to ensure high-quality products
